Room.Name: Lyanden Tomb Site
Room.ShortDescription: You stand below the magnificent entrance to the Lyanden Tomb.
Room.LongDescription: The tomb floats quietly about three meters above ground. White marble sheets and columns reflect the light of day quite beautifully, although your vision is somewhat impaired by the chilly mist that has been following you around. A crypt guardian hovers over the portico entrance to the tomb, so watch your step.
